title: Ep 149: Sally's Here To Stay, SallyHeads
itunes:title: Ep 149: Sally's Here To Stay, SallyHeads
itunes:subtitle: Getting to know Sally Tamarkin, our new permanent guest co-host, until she says she's over it!
description:
If you haven’t guessed yet, Sally Tamarkin is here for the long haul (or until she gets sick of doing this; really who knows!). This episode will let Sally Heads get even more hardcore about their Sally Head-ness and for soon-to-be Sally Heads have their inaugural episode!


We play two truths and a lie and I make a claim that nothing bad happens at Disneyland, death-wise. Do not send me any claims refuting this. I will not read them. It's the only time I go on rollercoasters, I don't wanna know anything bad!
